author: paulhauner
content:
This is an interesting edge-case that we discovered recently:


> ...  the allocation of an attestation to a subnet is fork-dependant. I.e., two attestations with the same index and slot, but different beacon_block_root can be required to be published in two different subnets (only in rare circumstances)


https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-APIs/issues/52
